description: I put this on every build. It's stable, and allows me to turn extension on or off quickly. It also has a link on the bottom of the task bar to go and get more extensions from the gnome extensions website. If you use extensions this will be worth having. Debian 10, Ubuntu 19.04 I have used on both, works well.
summary: Easily turn extensions on or off

description: Works great with Debian 10 and Gnome 3.30 (Wayland)
